# Swift Project Workspace

This is a Swift development workspace configured for iOS/macOS development.

## Project Structure
- Basic Swift package or application structure
- Source files organized for development
- Build and test configurations

## Development Setup
- Swift compiler and toolchain required
- Xcode or Swift Package Manager for building
- VS Code with Swift extensions for development

## Build Instructions
- Use `swift build` for building the project
- Use `swift run` for running the executable
- Use `swift test` for running tests
